actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to improve Native Hawaiian education programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Native Hawaiian Education Reauthorization Act - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to: (1) reauthorize appropriations for Native Hawaiian Education; and (2) replace a series of categorical programs serving Native Hawaiian children and adults with a single authority for the Secretary of Education to assist such program activities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to improve Native Hawaiian education programs, and for other purposes.
